Articles.Content: in a sandbox save i have tried to regain a control of a rover using Mun relays, they are simple, a cubic strut, a 1/6 solar array, and a relay antenna. However, they are not working in that there is no relay signal, i am suspecting thy need some form of probe core as well, is this the case?
Yep,  you need a probe core on each relay or the game will treat them like debris.
